description:
Looney Test is the ultimate quiz for anyone who’s ever wondered, “Am I a little weird… or completely off the rails?” Dive into 12 ridiculous multiple-choice questions that will test your silliness, challenge your inner clown, and reveal just how delightfully looney you truly are. Play solo for a personal dose of absurdity or take turns with friends to see who’s the biggest goofball in the group!
Each answer secretly adds to your Looney Score, leading up to your grand reveal: the Looney Certificate! Will you be crowned a Mildly Goofy Goldfish or a Totally Bonkers Banana? There’s only one way to find out. Quick, wacky, and full of laughs, Looney Test turns every game night into a giggle-fest of pure nonsense and unfiltered fun
